text: ehet (nabiye!) ovungen adhyapana dænumen aga tænpat ayada, (satya) visvasavantayinda, oba kerehi pahala karana lada dæyada (mema dharmayada), obata pera pahala karana lada siyalla (dharmayan)da, (ættenma) visvasa kara, salatayada nokadava salat karannaha. sakatda gevamin sitinnaha. allahvada avasana dinayada visvasa karannaha. movunta (paralovadi) imahat vu phalavipakama api dennemu
